ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Dark Age of Camelot
ygData.msgSnippet: One of my favorite things about the Rolemaster system was not the open-end high criticals...it was the open-end low criticals.  I know it is a little sadistic,
ygData.messageBody:
One of my favorite things about the Rolemaster system was not the
open-end high criticals...it was the open-end low criticals. I know it is a
little sadistic, but I always enjoyed the multiple ways that game let you
mame yourself and your party members!

Lago
